snippet.title: Lumini Teaser Trailer 2015
snippet.description:
Lumini is a relaxing flow-adventure game in which you take your swarm of cute, flying creatures out on an adventure to save your planet. You'll battle monsters several times bigger than yourself,  solve puzzles and explore the many wonders of this alien planet. All this to achieve your final goal; healing the heart of the world.

Lumini is scheduled to release in the summer 2015 on Steam for PC, Mac and Linux

Follow Speelbaars and Lumini on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Speelbaars
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/speelbaars
Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/lumini
Websites: http://speelbaars.com/ or http://lumini-game.com/
